text: isamen shak nahin ki jin logon ne eemaan kubool kiya (musalamaan) aur yahoodee aur laamazahab log aur eesaee aur majoosee (aatishaparast) aur musharekeen (kuphfaar) yaqeenan khuda un logon ke daramiyaan qayaamat ke din (theek theek) faisala kar dega isamen shak nahin ki khuda har cheez ko dekh raha hai
